extendedInfo.description: Contineo WiFi â Free Wi-Fi Finder and Connection ManagerFind Free WiFi Hotspots, Instantly Connect, and get deals from our partners.Use Contineo WiFi to find Free Wi-Fi hotspots and automatically connect â no matter where you are! Contineo WiFi lets you find free and available Wi-Fi hot spots at your current location or wherever you may be travelling so you can connect to faster networks, reduce data charges and save money. Best of all, get deals and discounts from our partners exclusive to Contineo WiFi subscribers.â¢	Find free Wi-Fi hotspots around you or search by locationâ¢	Reduce carrier data charges and save money!â¢	Get discounts and coupons from our partnersFeatures:â¢	Find and connect thousands of hotspots worldwideâ¢	Reduce data plan usage and save money by using free Wi-Fiâ¢	View Wi-Fi hotspots on a map, get directions and save favorite hotspotsâ¢	Share hotspot locations via email and your favorite social networksâ¢	Get deals and free Wi-Fi from our growing list of partnersâ¢	Give friends and family secure access to your wireless networkâ¢	Extend battery life by using Wi-Fi instead of power hungry 3G/4G connectionsCompatibility:Compatible with High Resolution Displays Only. May not display on Low or Medium Resolution displays.(Note: does not work on rooted phones)Learn more at www.ContineoWiFi.com

reviews.title: Sweet!
reviews.comment: Can\'t wait for the deals... Thx for an amazing app! I recommend this to those who want an app to search for free wifi!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Like the layout. Map is the best I\'ve seen. Good app.  How soon for the deals.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works as they say
reviews.comment: Autoconnects at Starbucks and office depot. I like the map, easy to see the hot spots. Can\'t wait for the deals.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I\'ve seen lots of apps for rooted phones. This is the first one I\'ve seen for non rooted phones only.
reviews.author: A Google User
